title: Twitter for Android working on videos and pictures in the same tweet, ‘awards,’ more [Gallery]
content:
In the midst of its big Elon Musk shakeup, Twitter is still working on new features. This week, Twitter for Android has revealed support for adding both pictures and videos to the same tweet, hints at tweet “awards,” and more.

more…

The post Twitter for Android working on videos and pictures in the same tweet, ‘awards,’ more [Gallery] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Twitter is adding the ability for users to upload both videos and pictures within the same tweet, along with a new "awards" feature.
